# Goman.live Article Writing Guidelines

When creating or editing articles about the Goman.live service, follow these guidelines to ensure high-quality content. 
## Article Structure
Should  save authors style while improving readability and flow.
When we Write an article, we should follow this structure:
1. **Title**: Clear and concise, reflecting the article's content
2. **Introduction**: Brief overview of the topic and its relevance to Goman.live users
3. **Body**: Detailed information, divided into sections with subheadings
   - Use bullet points or numbered lists for clarity
   - Include relevant examples, data, and references
4. **Conclusion**: Summarize key points and provide a call to action or next steps
5. **Meta Description**: A brief summary for SEO purposes   
6. ** Thanks to the viewer**: Acknowledge the viewer for their time and encourage feedback or questions
## Writing Style
- Use clear and concise language
- Maintain a professional yet approachable tone
- Avoid jargon; explain technical terms when necessary
- Use active voice for engagement
- Vary sentence structure to maintain reader interest
## SEO Best Practices
- Incorporate relevant keywords naturally throughout the article
- Use descriptive headings and subheadings
- Include internal links to related Goman.live articles or resources
- Optimize images with alt text
- Ensure the article is mobile-friendly
## Proofreading and Editing
- Check for grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors
- Ensure consistency in terminology and style
- Verify all facts, data, and references for accuracy
- Read the article aloud to catch awkward phrasing or flow issues
## Final Checklist
- [ ] Title is clear and concise
- [ ] Article follows the defined structure
- [ ] Writing style is engaging and professional   
- [ ] SEO best practices are implemented
- [ ] Proofreading and editing completed
- [ ] Article is ready for publication  
## Example Article Structure
- **Title**: "Getting Started with Goman.live: A Comprehensive Guide"
- **Introduction**: "Goman.live is a powerful platform that helps you manage your projects                      efficiently. In this article, we will explore how to get started with Goman.live and make the most of its features."    
- **Body**:
   - **Section 1**: "Creating an Account"
     - Step-by-step guide to signing up
   - **Section 2**: "Navigating the Dashboard"
     - Overview of key features and tools
   - **Section 3**: "Managing Projects"
     - Tips for organizing and tracking project progress
- **Conclusion**: "By following this guide, you are now ready to start using Goman.live effectively. Explore the platform and discover how it can enhance your project management experience."
- **Meta Description**: "Learn how to get started with Goman.live in this comprehensive guide, covering account creation, dashboard navigation, and project management tips."
- **Thanks to the viewer**: "Thank you for taking the time to read this article      
    about Goman.live. We hope you found it helpful! If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out."
